body: EASEOUT was launched in February 2020 in Montreal, Canada. We're inspired by the latest design trends and web development technologies. Our aim is to provide creative inspiration, useful tutorials, articles and resources on an (almost) daily basis! The website runs on [](https://netlify.com)Netlify and is built with Vue.js. **FAQS:** **Q:** Can I advertise?\ **A:** Yes! [Find out more](https://www.easeout.co/advertise/). **Q:** How can I keep up with everything? \ **A**: Signup for [the newsletter](https://emailoctopus.com/lists/2c78099d-83e4-11ea-a3d0-06b4694bee2a/forms/subscribe) & follow us on [twitter](https://twitter.com/easeoutco)! **Q:** How can I show some love? \ **A:** You could buymeacoffee â˜•ðŸ˜ƒ Your suggestions & feedback are welcome! We always aim to bring new features & improve your user experience. \- Tim
